newsitem.title: USA: PTI Holding inc to buy SAS Safety.
newsitem.headline: PTI Holding inc to buy SAS Safety.

text.p: PTI Holding Inc, a maker of sports saftey equipment, said it is buying SAS Safety Corp in order to expand its presence in the safety equipment business.
SAS Safety, based in Long Beach, Calif., is a 15-year-old privately owned manufacturer and supplier of industrial safety and compliance products required by government enforcement agencies.
SAS Safety sales topped $9 million in the fiscal year ending February 28, 1997, PTI said in a statement.
PTI will use cash and stock to buy the privately held SAS.
Eact financial terms of the sale were not disclosed.
